title: Lagging only on ranked games
body: I've played three ranked games in the past few days and I've been getting really high ping in all of them, but whenever I play normal,custom or ARAM my ping stays low is it my internet's problem is this something to do with riot. I can't play ranked properly and honestly it's pissing me off.

replies.body: That's really weird. Only in ranked games? Are you sure that it wasn't just when you played ranked it was stormy or something?
